steps.name: Backup Current DNS Settings
steps.description: Screenshot GoDaddy DNS records for rollback
steps.action: Navigate to GoDaddy DNS Manager → DNS > Manage DNS

steps.name: Contact Leanne Fonte for SSL Support
steps.description: Get SSL support for reggieanddro.com → reggieanddro.company.site

steps.name: Get Lightspeed IP Address
steps.description: Obtain Lightspeed IP for A record
steps.action: Request from Leanne Fonte or Lightspeed support

steps.name: Prepare DNS Records
steps.action: A Record: @ → [Lightspeed IP], CNAME: www → reggieanddro.company.site

steps.name: Verify Checkout Flow
steps.action: Place test order, verify Authorize.net processing

nextSteps: Wait for Kaja bank review approval
